meta_title: Breakdown Maintenance: A CFO's Guide to Strategy & Cost
meta_description: Go beyond the basics of breakdown maintenance. Learn its true cost, when to use it strategically, and how to transition to a proactive model in 2025.
title: The Strategic CFO's Guide to Breakdown Maintenance: More Than Just Fixing What's Broken
